official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Blackbeard Island National Wildlife Refuge, McIntosh County, Ga., as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates various lands in the Blackbeard Island National Wildlife Refuge, McIntosh County, Georgia, as wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Blackbeard Island National Wildlife Refuge, McIntosh County, Ga., as wilderness.
